item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Money-Laundering Practices in the Online Scam Industry (65 points | 12 comments)
2. It's hard to write code for computers, but it's harder to write code for humans (163 points | 51 comments)
3. CNN and USA Today Have Fake Websites, I Believe Forbes Marketplace Runs Them (257 points | 68 comments)
4. MTA Open Data Challenge (22 points | 1 comment)
5. Collaborative Text Editing with e.g.-Walker: Better, Faster, Smaller (32 points | 2 comments)
6. Raft: Understandable Distributed Consensus (31 points | 4 comments)
7. WordPress Drama: From the Sidelines (17 points | 16 comments)
8. Everything we know about spies is wrong (71 points | 47 comments)
9. The CRPG Book Project (26 points | 6 comments)
10. I've Soured on Open Source (12 points | 15 comments)
11. Legalizing Sports Gambling Was a Mistake (763 points | 691 comments)
12. Maggie Smith, Star of 'Downton Abbey,' 'Harry Potter,' Dies at 89 (81 points | 7 comments)
13. LlamaF: An Efficient Llama2 Architecture Accelerator on Embedded FPGAs (16 points | discuss)
14. Our container platform is in production. It has GPUs. Here's an early look (60 points | 1 comment)
15. Japan's humble onigiri took over lunchtimes around the world (41 points | 1 comment)
16. I've built a city, now it needs residents (85 points | 62 comments)
17. OpenAI is closing in on raising $6.5B. Largest VC raise in history (63 points | 41 comments)
18. The Best $4 Ever Spent (10 points | 2 comments)
19. Imbue (YC S17) Is Hiring a Founding Product Engineer ( | hide)
20. CouchDB 3.4.1 Released (64 points | 35 comments)
21. End of an era: Landsat 7 mission takes final images (243 points | 45 comments)
22. Agitating Homemade PCBs with Ease (8 points | 5 comments)
23. TSMC execs allegedly dismissed OpenAI CEO Sam Altman as 'podcasting bro' (361 points | 364 comments)
24. I Am Tired of AI (588 points | 580 comments)
25. I have 2000 old VHS tapes in my garage and don't know what to do with them (282 points | 264 comments)
26. Hacking Kia: Remotely controlling cars with just a license plate (531 points | 313 comments)
27. EU privacy regulator fines Meta 91M euros over password storage (33 points | 7 comments)
28. Vanilla OS 2: an immutable distribution to run all software (146 points | 43 comments)
29. A pilot project in universal algebra to explore new ways to collaborate (168 points | 22 comments)
30. Why are my ZFS disks so noisy? (137 points | 44 comments)
